home.tip_status_monitoring: The status overview shows real-time information about all your servers

Welcome to the Module Scaffold Generator.
Please select setup method and click 'Next' to start.

scaffold.additional_headers: Additional Header Files (comma separated, e.g. utils.hpp,math.hpp):

welcome.title: Welcome to HEAL
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started with Hello ElementAstro Launcher
welcome.description: HEAL is a powerful launcher and management system for astronomical software. This wizard will help you set up the application and learn about its features.
welcome.features_title: What you can do with HEAL:

user_level.title: Tell us about yourself
user_level.subtitle: This helps us customize your experience
user_level.question: What's your experience level?
user_level.intermediate: Intermediate - Some experience with similar tools
user_level.advanced: Advanced - Experienced user, minimal guidance needed
user_level.beginner_desc:
• More detailed explanations and tips
• Step-by-step tutorials
• Helpful tooltips and guidance
user_level.intermediate_desc:
• Balanced guidance and freedom
• Optional tutorials
• Contextual help when needed
user_level.advanced_desc:
• Minimal guidance and tips
• Quick access to advanced features
• Streamlined interface

completion.title: You're all set!
completion.subtitle: HEAL is ready to use
completion.description: Your setup is complete. You can now start using HEAL to manage your astronomical software and servers.

tips.server_management_basics: Right-click on server cards for advanced options like restart and settings
tips.quick_actions_bar: Use the action bar at the bottom for quick operations on all servers
tips.context_menus: Access server folders and logs through the context menu
tips.keyboard_shortcuts_basic: Use Ctrl+R to refresh, Ctrl+S to start all, Ctrl+T to stop all
tips.keyboard_shortcuts_advanced: Try Ctrl+Shift+L for logs, Ctrl+Alt+S for settings, and F5 for force refresh
tips.module_development: Use the scaffold generator in Tools to quickly create new modules
tips.environment_configuration: Configure your development environment for optimal performance
tips.batch_operations: Select multiple servers and use batch operations for efficiency
tips.log_monitoring: Monitor logs in real-time to quickly identify and resolve issues
tips.interface_customization: Customize the interface theme and layout in Settings
tips.theme_selection: Choose from multiple themes to personalize your experience
tips.connection_issues: Check your network connection and proxy settings if servers won't connect
tips.performance_optimization: Close unused applications and check system resources for better performance

help.home_server_cards: These cards show the status of your configured servers. Click to start/stop, right-click for more options.
help.home_quick_actions: Use these buttons to quickly start all servers, stop all servers, or refresh the status.
help.home_status_overview: This overview shows real-time information about all your servers and system status.
help.launcher_server_config: Configure your server settings here. Make sure to set the correct paths and parameters.
help.download_module_store: Browse and download modules to extend HEAL's functionality. Check compatibility before installing.
help.environment_setup: Configure your development environment for optimal performance and compatibility.
help.tools_scaffold: Use the scaffold generator to quickly create new modules with proper structure and templates.
help.settings_customization: Customize HEAL's appearance and behavior to match your preferences.
help.connection_error_help: Connection failed. Check your network settings, firewall, and server configuration.
help.performance_help: Performance issues detected. Try closing unused applications or check system resources.

feature_tour.title: Feature Tour
feature_tour.description: A quick tour of HEAL's main features and interface

welcome.title: Welcome to HEAL
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour of the main features and learn how to use HEAL effectively.

home.title: Home Dashboard
home.content: This is your main dashboard where you can see all server status and perform quick actions.

servers.title: Server Management
servers.content: These cards represent your servers. Click to start/stop, right-click for advanced options.

actions.title: Quick Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons for batch operations like starting all servers or refreshing status.

server_setup.title: First Server Setup
server_setup.description: Learn how to configure and launch your first server

navigate.title: Navigate to Launcher
navigate.content: Click on the Launcher tab to access server configuration options.

config.title: Server Configuration
config.content: Configure your server settings including paths, ports, and startup parameters.

settings.title: Open Settings
settings.content: Click on the Settings tab to access customization options.

theme.title: Theme Selection
theme.content: Choose from different themes to personalize your HEAL experience.

advanced.title: Advanced Features
advanced.description: Explore HEAL's advanced tools and capabilities

tools.title: Tools Overview
tools.content: The Tools section contains powerful utilities for development and system management.

modules.title: Module Development
modules.content: Use the scaffold generator to create custom modules and extend HEAL's functionality.

workflow.title: Interactive Workflow Tutorial
workflow.description: Learn complete workflows with hands-on practice

intro.title: Workflow Introduction
intro.content: This tutorial will guide you through complete workflows in HEAL with interactive steps.

lifecycle.title: Server Lifecycle Management
lifecycle.content: Learn to start, monitor, and manage server lifecycles. Please start a server to continue.

monitoring.title: Log Monitoring
monitoring.content: View and analyze server logs for troubleshooting. Click on logs to continue.

batch.title: Batch Operations
batch.content: Use batch operations to manage multiple servers efficiently. Try a batch operation.

module_dev.title: Module Development Tutorial
module_dev.description: Learn to create and test custom modules

scaffold.title: Module Scaffolding
scaffold.content: Use the scaffold tool to generate module templates and structure.

create.title: Create Module
create.content: Create your first custom module using the scaffold generator.

test.title: Test Module
test.content: Test your module to ensure it works correctly before deployment.

hints.start_server: Click on a server card and select 'Start' from the menu
hints.view_logs: Right-click on a server and select 'View Logs'
hints.use_batch_operation: Use the quick action buttons at the bottom to perform batch operations
hints.create_module: Fill out the module creation form and click 'Generate'
hints.test_module: Click the 'Test' button to validate your module

setup_first_server.title: Set Up Your First Server
setup_first_server.description: Get started by configuring and launching your first server in the Launcher section.

explore_modules.title: Explore Available Modules
explore_modules.description: Discover new modules in the Download section to extend HEAL's functionality.

optimize_performance.title: Optimize Performance
optimize_performance.description: Your system performance could be improved. Check the performance settings.

configure_proxy.title: Configure Proxy Settings
configure_proxy.description: Connection issues detected. Consider configuring proxy settings for better connectivity.

setup_environment.title: Set Up Development Environment
setup_environment.description: Configure your development environment for optimal module development.

batch_server_management.title: Use Batch Operations
batch_server_management.description: Manage multiple servers more efficiently with batch operations.

create_custom_module.title: Create Custom Module
create_custom_module.description: Ready to create your own modules? Use the scaffold tool to get started.

check_logs.title: Check Server Logs
check_logs.description: Issues detected. Check the server logs for detailed error information.

update_configuration.title: Update Configuration
update_configuration.description: Your configuration may need updates. Review your settings.

server_context_menu.name: Server Context Menu
server_context_menu.description: Right-click on server cards to access advanced options like restart, settings, and logs.

quick_actions_bar.name: Quick Actions Bar
quick_actions_bar.description: Use the action bar at the bottom for batch operations on multiple servers.

status_monitoring.name: Real-time Status Monitoring
status_monitoring.description: Monitor server status and performance in real-time with the status overview.

batch_operations.name: Batch Operations
batch_operations.description: Perform operations on multiple servers simultaneously for improved efficiency.

log_monitoring.name: Log Monitoring
log_monitoring.description: Monitor server logs in real-time to quickly identify and resolve issues.

module_store.name: Module Store
module_store.description: Browse and download modules to extend HEAL's functionality.

module_development.name: Module Development
module_development.description: Create custom modules using the scaffold generator and development tools.

environment_configuration.name: Environment Configuration
environment_configuration.description: Configure development environments for optimal performance and compatibility.

custom_commands.name: Custom Commands
custom_commands.description: Create and use custom commands for advanced automation and workflows.

api_integration.name: API Integration
api_integration.description: Integrate with external APIs and services for enhanced functionality.
